The 2025 NBA Finals, featuring the Indiana Pacers against the Oklahoma City Thunder, is a best-of-seven series that began on June 5, 2025. Below is the complete schedule with dates, times, and results where available, based on the provided information. All times are in Eastern Time (ET), and all games are broadcast live on ABC.

  • Game 1: Thursday, June 5, 2025, at Oklahoma City, 8:30 p.m. ET
    • Result: Pacers 111, Thunder 110 (Pacers lead series 1-0)
    • Note: Indiana staged a comeback from a 15-point deficit, with Tyrese Haliburton hitting a game-winning shot.
  • Game 2: Sunday, June 8, 2025, at Oklahoma City, 8:00 p.m. ET
    • Result: To be determined (game scheduled for today, as of June 7, 2025)

  • Game 3: Wednesday, June 11, 2025, at Indiana, 8:30 p.m. ET

  • Game 4: Friday, June 13, 2025, at Indiana, 8:30 p.m. ET

  • Game 5 (if necessary): Monday, June 16, 2025, at Oklahoma City, 8:30 p.m. ET

  • Game 6 (if necessary): Thursday, June 19, 2025, at Indiana, 8:30 p.m. ET

  • Game 7 (if necessary): Sunday, June 22, 2025, at Oklahoma City, 8:00 p.m. ET

Additional Notes:

  • The series follows a 2-2-1-1-1 format, with Oklahoma City, the team with the better regular-season record (68-14), hosting Games 1, 2, 5, and 7 (if necessary).
  • The Pacers, the Eastern Conference No. 4 seed, advanced by defeating the New York Knicks in six games in the Eastern Conference Finals, while the top-seeded Thunder beat the Minnesota Timberwolves in five games in the Western Conference Finals.
  • This Finals matchup is notable for featuring two teams vying for their first NBA championship, the first such Finals since 2006.
  • All games are available on ABC, with streaming options on services like YouTube TV, Hulu + Live TV, fuboTV, and DIRECTV STREAM, or via ESPN Radio, ESPN Deportes, and the ESPN App.

As of now, the Pacers lead the series 1-0 after their Game 1 victory. For the latest updates on results, you can check NBA.com or ESPN.com, as the series is ongoing.

All games are broadcast live on ABC, with streaming options noted at the end. The series follows a 2-2-1-1-1 format, and the Pacers currently lead 1-0 after a 111-110 win in Game 1 on June 5, 2025.

  • Game 1: Friday, June 6, 2025, at Oklahoma City, 9:30 a.m. Beijing Time
    • Result: Pacers 111, Thunder 110 (Pacers lead series 1-0)
  • Game 2: Monday, June 9, 2025, at Oklahoma City, 9:00 a.m. Beijing Time

  • Game 3: Thursday, June 12, 2025, at Indiana, 9:30 a.m. Beijing Time

  • Game 4: Saturday, June 14, 2025, at Indiana, 9:30 a.m. Beijing Time

  • Game 7 (if necessary): Monday, June 23, 2025, at Oklahoma City, 9:00 a.m. Beijing Time

Notes:

  • Beijing Time is 13 hours ahead of Eastern Time (ET). For example, 8:30 p.m. ET on June 5 becomes 9:30 a.m. Beijing Time on June 6.
